name: Kasha Bear Claw
description: A claw pulled out from a kasha bear after killing it. Collect 5 of these

name: Kasha Blade Spider Talon
description: A talon pulled out from a kasha blade spider after killing it. Collect 5 of these

name: Scarlet Salamander Scale
description: A scale of a scarlet salamander. Collect 5 of these

name: Fiery Spirit Scroll
description: The first scroll containing secret of kabart, the Orcs' traditional martial arts

name: Rosheek's Letter
description: A letter written by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this to Gantaki Zu Urutu

name: Gantaki's Letter of Recommendation
description: Gantaki's letter of recommendation. Receive the help of Gatekeeper Tamil and take this recommendation to Prefect Kasman in the Village of Gludin

name: Fig
description: A fig given by Prefect Kasman. Take this to Khavatari Toruku

name: 4th Leather Pouch
description: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Toruku. Take this, kill fighters of various races and collect 12 tokens

name: 4th Leather Pouch (Full)
description: A full pouch of 12 tokens after killing fighters of various races. Take this to Khavatari Toruku

name: Vuku Orc Tusk
description: A tusk obtained after killing a vuku Orc. Gather 3 of these

name: Ratman Fang
description: A fang from a dead ratman fighter. Gather 3 of these

name: Langk Lizardman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained after killing a Langk lizardman. Gather 3 of these

name: Felim Lizardman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained after killing the Felim lizardman. Gather 3 of these

name: Iron Will Scroll
description: The second scroll that contains secret of the Orcs' traditional martial arts, Kabart

name: Toruku's Letter
description: A letter from Khavatari Toruku. Take this to Prefect Kasman

name: Khavatari Totem
description: A token given to one who has qualifications to change occupations to Orc Monk. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Monk

name: Fire Charm
description: A charm with inscription of fire mantra. Take this and find the 3 items that Tataru spoke of

name: Kasha Bear Pelt
description: A pelt of kasha bear. Take to Tataru along with kasha bladespider husk and fiery egg

name: Kasha Blade Spider Husk
description: The husk of a kasha blade spider. Take it to Tatar along with a kasha bear pelt and a fiery egg

name: 1st Fiery Egg
description: A spirit egg obtained from a scarlet salamander. Take it to Tataru along with a kasha bear pelt and a kasha bladespider husk

name: Hestui Mask
description: A mask in shape of bear. Take this and go to Hestui totem spirit

name: 2nd Fiery Egg
description: A spirit egg received from a scarlet salamander. Take this to the Hestui totem spirit

name: Totem Spirit Claw
description: A claw received from Hestui totem spirit. Take this and go to Tataru

name: Tataru's Letter of Recommendation
description: A letter written by Tataru. Take this to Seer Umos in the town of Gludin

name: Flame Charm
description: A charm with inscription of flame mantra. Take this and gather grizzly blood and take to Seer Umos

name: Grizzly Blood
description: A glass bottle filled with grizzly blood. Gather 3 and take to Seer Umos

name: Blood Cauldron
description: A cauldron filled with grizzly blood. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit

name: Spirit Net
description: A net made with Spirit's Spider Silk. Use this to capture Durka Spirit hidden inside Venomous Spiders

name: Bound Durka Spirit
description: Durka spirit bound inside Spirit Net. Take this to the Duda-Mara totem spirit

name: Durka Parasite
description: An evil parasite spirit that comes out from spiders contaminated with the evil durka spirit. It is the key for calling upon the evil durka spirit

name: Totem Spirit Blood
description: Blood spilt by the Duda-Mara totem spirit. Take this and go to Seer Umos

name: Mask of Medium
description: A token that shows one has the qualifications to become an Orc Shaman. Take this to the high prefect, to change your occupation to an Orc Shaman

name: Silvera's Ring
description: A ring given to artisan aspirants by Blacksmith Silvera. Strike down the boogle ratman gang and collect their front teeth

name: 1st Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the 1st artisan test. To take the next test, you must go to Blacksmith Kluto of the village Gludin

name: 2nd Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the 2nd artisan test. Take this and go to Blacksmith Kluto in Gludin

name: Final Pass Certificate
description: The certificate for passing the final Artisan test. Take this to the head blacksmith to change occupations to an Artisan

name: Boogle Ratman Tooth
description: The ugly front bucktooth of a boogle ratman. Just looking at it will make you nauseous. Collect 10 of these and take them to Blacksmith Silvera

name: Boogle Ratman Leader's Tooth
description: The boogle ratman leader's big tooth. Before its stink makes you pass out, collect 2 of them and take them to Blacksmith Silvera

name: Kluto's Letter
description: Blacksmith Kluto's letter. Take to Blacksmith Pinter in the Town of Gludio

name: Footprint of Thief
description: Trace left by thieves. Kill Vuku Orc fighters, recover stolen items and take them to Blacksmith Pinter

name: Stolen Secret Box
description: A secret box stolen by Vuku orc fighters. The contents of the box are unknown, but anyway, take it to Blacksmith Pinter

name: Secret Box
description: A secret box received from Pinter. The contents are unknown, but do not worry and take it to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin

name: Ring of Raven
description: A mark certifying that one has earned the right to become a Scavenger. If you take it to a Warehouse Chief, you can transfer your class to Scavenger

name: Pippi's Letter of Recommendation
description: A letter of introduction written by Collector Pipi. Take this to Trader Mion

name: Raut's Teleport Scroll
description: An order sheet given by Warehouse Freightman Raut. Give it to Torai, in the south of Death Pass

name: Succubus Undies
description: The underwear of Succubus received from Torai. Take this to Warehouse Freightman Raut of Gludin

name: Mion's Letter
description: A letter sent from Trader Mion to her brother. Take this letter and go to Master Toma

name: Bronk's Ingot
description: An ingot to be given to Chief Blacksmith Bronk

name: Shari's Axe
description: An axe to be given to Trader Shari

name: Zimenf's Potion
description: A potion to give to Priest of the Earth Zimenf

name: Bronk's Pay
description: Product cost given by Chief Blacksmith Bronk. Take this to Trader Mion

name: Shari's Pay
description: Product cost given by Shari. Take this to Trader Mion

name: Zimenf's Pay
description: Product cost given by Zimenf. Take this to Trader Mion

name: Bear Picture
description: A picture of a bear received by Master Toma. Take this to hunt hunter bears, then the honey bear will appear

name: Tarantula Picture
description: A picture of spider received by Master Toma. Use this to hunt tarantulas

name: Honey Jar
description: A honey jar taken from a honey bear. Collect 5 and take them to Master Toma

name: Bead
description: A bead obtained from tarantula. Gather 20 of these and give to Master Toma

name: Bead Parcel
description: A parcel made of beads. Give this to Warehouse Freightman Raut of Gludin

name: Gatekeeper Charm
description: Used to teleport from the Orc Village to Gludin

name: Gatekeeper Token
description: Used to teleport from the Dwarven Village to Gludin

name: Cursed Maingauche
description: Cursed Maingauche. Although its P. Atk. is weak, it gives bleeding effect with a certain rate during a critical attacks

name: Wood
description: A material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop

name: (Not In Use) Trunk
description: A material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop

name: Steel Powder
description: A material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop

name: World Map
description: An ancient, obsolete map. Can be purchased at any shop

name: Recipe: Wooden Arrow
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Wooden Arrow. Requires Create Item Level 1. The success rate is 100%

name: Spellbook: Summon Shadow
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Shadow. Used by Dark Wizards.\\nRequired level: 20\0

name: Spellbook: Summon Mew the Cat
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Mew the Cat. Used by Human Wizards.\\nRequired level: 20\0

name: Spellbook: Summon Boxer the Unicorn
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Boxer the Unicorn. Used by Elven Wizards.\\nRequired level: 20\0

name: Spellbook: Summon Mirage the Unicorn
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Mirage the Unicorn. Used by Elven Wizards.\\nRequired level: 20\0

name: Spellbook: Summon Silhouette
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Silhouette. Used by Dark Wizards.\\nRequired level: 20\0

name: Twig of Treant
description: A material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop

description: A material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop

description: A material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop

description: A material used to make Dwarven items. Can be sold in any shop
